name: Peinjector
author: Maximiliano Tedesco <maxitedesco1@gmail.com>
description: This module will inject a specified windows payload into a target executable.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: PAYLOAD
options.description: Windows Payload to inject into the targer executable.

options.name: LHOST
options.description: IP of host that will receive the connection from the payload.

options.name: LPORT
options.description: Port for Payload to connect to.

options.name: TARGETPE
options.description: Path of the target executable to be injected

options.name: OPTIONS
options.description: Comma separated list of additional options for payload if needed in 'opt=val,opt=val' format.
